data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: First, it is a telephoto design. That ____ a relatively ____ focal ____ primary ____ by a ____ focal ____ secondary. This ____ a strategy ____ in ____ camera ____. Secondly, the path is folded by using mirrors.
data.partBlankContent: First, it is a telephoto design. That me___ a relatively sh___ focal len___ primary foll____ by a nega____ focal len___ secondary. This i_ a strategy us__ in lo__ camera len___. Secondly, the path is folded by using mirrors.
data.answer: 首先，它是长焦设计。这意味着一个相对较短的主要焦距透镜和一个负的次要焦距透镜。这是长镜头使用的策略。其次，利用镜像对路径进行折叠。
